name: Cubes vs Spheres (Code Scrambler)
description:
The war has been going on for years. The two sides have been fighting desperately to conquer the lands of Shapetopia. If everything goes right, this should be their final battle...

How To Play

-Move the camera with the bottom left slider

-Miners collect gold, which can be seen in the top left corner

-You can buy units with gold in the top middle

-Buy more miners to collect more gold

-Use the buttons in the top right corner to change time speed(pause, normal, fast forward)

-Use the buttons in the bottom right corner to change the war plan(retreat, defend, attack)

-The goal is to kill the enemy Queen and protect your King

How it fits the theme?

This game was made for the BTP Game Jam. It has less complex shapes, but more FPS; if you play less aggressively, you'll have more chance to win; the less gold you have, the more your miners will generate; etc... I worked hard on this game and I really like it. This was my first game jam and I learned a lot from it. Good luck to everyone participating!

Credits

https://www.fesliyanstudios.com - Music and sound effects

Everything else was made by me
